conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a high-quality isometric cutaway with clear verticality.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection. Wall geometry and interior volumes are perfectly rendered. Minimal deduction for slight glass reflectance inconsistency.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Exceptional room fidelity. All rooms (Maid's room, 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, utility/kitchen/living) are correctly placed and proportional.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan perfectly, including specific items like the L-shaped couch and dining table set.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render. No text contamination. Lighting is balanced, making all interior details readable.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing orientations in some transitions differ slightly from 2D symbology but maintain functionality.

summary: An outstanding 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric and layout fidelity from the original flat floor plan.
